page.title: 06AN ADULTS TYPICAL DAY
page.content: At{07.00}hours most working adults get up .For breakfast they have cereal toast and marmalade and tea or coffee. Most people have cars or motorbikes to get to work.Lots of people work in offices writing reports and interviewing people.These people work from{09.00-17.00.}Some people on the other hand work at more practical jobs.When they get home many adults watch T.V., including the news.In free time they enjoy a bit of gardening and D.I.Y as a hobby.Most jobs supply canteen meal service however lots of people take packed lunches.In the evening many people have their main meal , with their families .Many people get home at{18.00}hours and go to bed at around{23.00.
